childMarkdownRemark.html: Mingdao ApaaS On-Premise is the core of Mingdao.com APaaS. We made it possible via container technology. Thus enterprise users can take use of the highly usable, reliable and scalable APaaS product. Every citizen developer can build their own business app in minutes, when adopting digital transformation.
